deduction_content: The thumb is not pressing on the second segment of both the index and middle fingers

questions.question: What is the error code for Qu치n (Fist)?
What are the two main deduction points for Qu치n (Fist)?
questions.answer: Deductions are applied when: 1) Face of fist is uneven, and 2) The thumb is not pressing on the second segment of both the index and middle fingers.

questions.question: How should the thumb be positioned in a correct Qu치n (Fist)?
questions.answer: The thumb should be pressing on the second segment of both the index and middle fingers.
